name: Heartbeat (Laughing Lick)
description:
My Studio Two Project - A Rhythm Combat Prototype made in Unity, using Koreographer.

Heartbeat is a snack size game about standing perilously at the edge of the sublime. Holding your shield aloft and reaching out with both hands to grasp the entrails of long forgotten angels. A puppeteer of divine taxidermy and all that stands between the ones you love, and younger, hungrier gods.
